evaluateIntoNamedSet

public BusinessObjectList evaluateIntoNamedSet(Context context,
                                               java.lang.String setName,
                                               boolean overwrite,
                                               java.lang.String sortBySelect,
                                               int direction,
                                               int dataType,
                                               int returnCount,
                                               Visuals visuals)
                                        throws MatrixException
Evaluate the Query into a Named Set. The User can return a partial list BusinessObjects from the Set to be used for example in a paging schema. Set methods can be used to retrieve other BusinessObjects.
Parameters:
context - the context for this request
setName - the set to use.
overwrite - if true overwrite the set otherwise append.
sortBySelect - Matrix select statement used to sort set.
direction - of the sort, defined in SortConstants.
dataType - of the sort, defined in SortConstants.
returnCount - number of objects to return. Setting the parameter to zero (0) will return no objects from the Query. Setting the parameter to a negative number will return all objects from the Query.
visuals - the visuals to use for this request
Returns:
a list of BusinessObjects
Throws:
MatrixException - when unable to retrieve data from the BOS
Since:
ADK 9.1.0
See Also:
SortConstants, Set

evaluateIntoNamedSet

public void evaluateIntoNamedSet(Context context,
                                 java.lang.String setName,
                                 boolean overwrite)
                          throws MatrixException
Evaluate the Query into a Named Set.
Parameters:
context - the context for this request
setName - the set to use.
overwrite - if true overwrite the set otherwise append.
Returns:
void
Throws:
MatrixException - when unable to retrieve data from the BOS
Since:
ADK 9.1.0
